========================
Changes for lovely.spice
========================

2017/02/14 0.1.2
================

 - added package description

2016/02/29 0.1.1
================

 - added encoding to dump call used in renderer

2016/02/29 0.1.1
================

 - added encoding to dump call used in renderer

2015/12/17 0.1.0
================

 - ignore errors during cleanup

 - BREAKING CHANGE
   do not create subfolder in targetDir named like sourceDir

 - loader must follow symlinks

2015/12/16 0.0.5
================

 - added FileRenderer to support rendering of single templates by CLI

2015/12/03 0.0.4
================

 - refactored renderer to support single template rendering with custom
   context

2015/11/26 0.0.3
================

 - included required versions.cfg in MANIFEST.in


2015/11/26 0.0.2
================

 - added missing MANIFEST.in


2015/11/26 0.0.1
================

 - initial release
